input_text:
Job Title: Clinical Supervisor

Location: Plymouth, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Health Care Provider, Management

Description:
Maxim Healthcare Services is hiring for a RN/Clinical Supervisor in our Plymouth, MA officeAt Maxim Healthcare Services, we firmly believe that our employees are the heartbeat of our organization and we are happy to offer the following benefits:
Competitive pay & weekly paychecksHealth, dental, vision, and life insurance401(k) savings planAwards and recognition programsMileage and cell phone reimbursement as well as the possibility of a flexible work schedule once training is completed
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Responsible for the clinical oversight from admission through discharge of homecare clients and patients served. This oversight will include supervision of:Care management and personnel management associated with the clinical delivery.Orientation and ongoing evaluation of homecare caregivers.The assurance of clinical skills and competency of caregivers.Caregiver development through education and training under the direction of the office clinical leader.The position will be both in office and field facing with travel required to patient homes for onsite visits
Minimum Requirements:
Active RN license required (states in which office and patients are located)Minimum one year experience as a Registered Nurse preferredSupervisory experience preferredExcellent written and verbal communication skillsKnowledge of Microsoft Office and computer literacy is requiredProficiency in the English language is requiredLooking for a team player with skills in time management, organization, and customer service
Salary Details:Compensation: $75,000 - $80,000 plus annual bonus potential of $3,500, paid out quarterly
#IND123

About Maxim Healthcare ServicesMaxim Healthcare Services has been making a difference in the lives of our patients, caregivers, employees and communities for more than 30 years. We offer private duty nursing, skilled nursing, physical rehabilitation, companion care, respite care and behavioral care for individuals with chronic and acute illnesses and disabilities. Our commitment to quality customer service, compassionate patient care, and filling critical healthcare needs makes us a trusted partner wherever care is needed.
Maxim Healthcare Services is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.Explore LocationApply Now

Experience Level (if available): None

Travel to patient homes for onsite visits.
